message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $105 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $108 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I'm getting closer to your price, but I can't go any lower than $110. This is still a good deal for you, considering the product's value. Let me know if you're willing to meet me at this price.
